body_html: Also, not sure if complex64 is an issue yet, but once it is we'll want a primitive which is slightly weaker than atomic add / sub, since it's fine to add both components at unrelated points in the sequence.
body_text: Also, not sure if complex64 is an issue yet, but once it is we'll want a primitive which is slightly weaker than atomic add / sub, since it's fine to add both components at unrelated points in the sequence.
body: Also, not sure if `complex64` is an issue yet, but once it is we'll want a primitive which is slightly weaker than atomic add / sub, since it's fine to add both components at unrelated points in the sequence.
